org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent.render

Class ConfigurableRendererMono

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processor.connectedcomponent.render.ConfigurableRendererMono
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectedComponentProcessor

    public class ConfigurableRendererMono
extends Object
implements ConnectedComponentProcessor
    This renderer encapsulates various other renderers in an easy to configure class, allowing multiple renderers to be called in one go. This class is designed for greyscale FImages.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
